meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6384.

td.p: Julie Zukowski, a public librarian from Crystal Lake, Illinois
Ursula Rodgers, a homemaker and visual artist from Denver, Colorado
Joel Pool, a real estate developer from Oakland, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $69,600)

tr.td: SHAKESPEAREAN LINES
WE BAND OF BROTHERS
MY SALAD DAYS
ALL THE WORLD'S A STAGE
2B OR NOT 2B
THE WINTER OF OUR DISCOUNT TENT
